sentences.sentence: His face was puce with rage.
I want puce gloves and green boots.
sentences.translation: 我要戴深褐色的手套，穿绿色长统靴。

sentences.sentence: Enclosed in his little glass-fronted office, Carolinecould see his face growing more puce by the moment.
sentences.translation: e卡若琳坐在由玻璃窗围着的办公室里，看着他的脸变得更紫了。
